title: TERMS AND CONDITIONS
description: Provides the overall name or introduction to the Terms and Conditions document.

title: A  ITUNES STORE, MAC APP STORE, APP STORE, AND IBOOKS STORE TERMS OF SALE
description: Mentions the first reference to terms of sale for iTunes Store, Mac App Store, App Store, and iBooks Store. No content under this heading here, likely a placeholder or table of contents reference.

title: B  ITUNES STORE TERMS AND CONDITIONS
description: Mentions the second reference to iTunes Store Terms and Conditions. No content under this heading here, likely a placeholder or table of contents reference.

title: C  MAC APP STORE, APP STORE AND IBOOKS STORE TERMS AND CONDITIONS
description: Covers the legal agreements between you and iTunes for using the Mac App Store, App Store, and iBooks Store, including references to legal disclaimers and resources for more information.

title: A  ITUNES STORE, MAC APP STORE, APP STORE AND IBOOKS STORE TERMS OF SALE
description: Specifies the terms of sale for the iTunes Store, Mac App Store, App Store, and iBooks Store. No content here, likely an introduction to further details.

title: PAYMENTS, TAXES, AND REFUND POLICY
description: Explains the obligations for product payments, associated taxes, and the conditions under which refunds may be processed.

title: 1-Click®
description: Describes the 1-Click purchase feature, how it works, and associated usage information.

title: GIFT CERTIFICATES, ITUNES CARDS AND CODES, ALLOWANCES, AND CONTENT CODES
description: Outlines rules, usage, and refundability of gift certificates, iTunes cards, content codes, and allowances.

title: GIFTS
description: Sets out policies for purchasing and redeeming gifts from the Stores.

title: IMPORTANT SAFETY INFORMATION
description: Provides guidelines and warnings to ensure safe usage of products to avoid physical discomfort or seizures.

title: PRE-ORDERS
description: Details how pre-orders work, including charging your account and how to cancel them.

title: FAMILY SHARING
description: Explains the Family Sharing feature, allowing multiple family members to share eligible purchases and manage shared payment methods.

title: ELECTRONIC CONTRACTING
description: Covers the ability to form binding agreements and make transactions electronically, including required hardware/software.

title: B  ITUNES STORE TERMS AND CONDITIONS
description: Introduces additional terms specifically applicable to the iTunes Store, referencing the legal agreement with iTunes SARL.

title: THE ITUNES STORE SERVICE
description: Summarizes the nature of the iTunes Store service, enabling the purchase, rental, or licensing of digital content.

title: REQUIREMENTS FOR USE OF THE SERVICE
description: Lists conditions to access the iTunes Store, including age requirements, location restrictions, and technical prerequisites.

title: YOUR ACCOUNT
description: Addresses account creation, security, and responsibilities of the account holder, including the use of Apple ID and password.

title: AUTOMATIC DELIVERY AND DOWNLOADING PREVIOUS PURCHASES
description: Describes how iTunes Eligible Content can be automatically delivered or re-downloaded across multiple devices.

title: ITUNES MATCH
description: Details the iTunes Match subscription service, which allows remote access to matched or uploaded music and associated features.

title: PRIVACY
description: Outlines Apple's privacy practices, including data collection for Genius recommendations and user control over data usage.

title: CONTENT AVAILABILITY
description: Explains that the availability and eligibility of digital content may change at any time without notice.

title: USE OF CONTENT
description: States that iTunes Products are licensed, not sold, and references compliance with usage rules set by iTunes and its licensors.

title: USAGE RULES
description: Enumerates how iTunes Products can be used, including permitted devices, copying limits, and restrictions for film rentals.

title: CONTENT SECURITY
description: Prohibits tampering with security technologies or frameworks that protect digital content distributed via the iTunes Store.

title: SERVICE SECURITY
description: Addresses restrictions on accessing the Service, prohibiting unauthorized modifications or attempts to circumvent access.

title: SEASON PASS, MULTI-PASS
description: Defines purchase, payment, and download rules for Season Pass or Multi-Pass subscriptions, including refunds and renewal policies.

title: HIGH-DEFINITION (HD) PRODUCTS
description: Explains compatibility requirements for HD products, including availability of standard-definition versions for non-HD devices.

title: SUBMISSIONS TO THE SERVICE
description: Covers rules for submitting user materials, ensuring that submissions do not violate laws or infringe others' rights.

title: THIRD-PARTY MATERIALS
description: Clarifies that third-party content and links are not under iTunes' responsibility, disclaiming liability for external materials.

title: OBJECTIONABLE MATERIAL
description: Warns users about potentially offensive or explicit content that may be encountered through the Service.

title: INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
description: Establishes ownership and protection of proprietary information and materials offered through the Service.

title: TERMINATION
description: Sets forth conditions under which iTunes may terminate the agreement or user access to the Service.

title: DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES; LIABILITY LIMITATIONS
description: Limits iTunes' liability, disclaims certain warranties, and addresses situations where iTunes may be held responsible.

title: CHANGES
description: States iTunes’ right to modify the Agreement or impose additional terms at any time.

title: MISCELLANEOUS
description: Provides concluding provisions on the agreement, covering scope, enforcement, and legal applicability.

title: C  MAC APP STORE, APP STORE AND IBOOKS STORE TERMS AND CONDITIONS
description: Introduces the terms applicable to Apple’s digital stores, including licensing and usage guidelines.

title: THE MAC APP STORE, APP STORE AND IBOOKS STORE
description: Presents an overview of the separate Apple Stores and the products available.

title: REQUIREMENTS FOR USE OF THE STORES
description: Specifies eligibility criteria, location restrictions, and technical prerequisites for users of the Stores.

title: YOUR ACCOUNT
description: Covers account setup, security, and user responsibilities related to account credentials.

title: AUTOMATIC DELIVERY AND DOWNLOADING PREVIOUS PURCHASES
description: Explains how eligible content can be auto-downloaded and re-downloaded on associated devices.

title: AUTOMATIC DELIVERY OF UPDATES
description: Describes how apps may update automatically and how users can control update settings.

title: APP BUNDLES
description: Addresses the purchase of multiple apps as a bundle and how pricing may be adjusted.

title: PRIVACY
description: Refers to Apple’s privacy policy and how user data is handled within the Stores.

title: USE OF PRODUCTS AND THE STORES
description: Outlines the basic rules for using Apple’s digital goods and services in the Stores.

title: CONTENT SECURITY
description: Prohibits tampering with or circumventing technical protections applied to digital content.

title: STORE SECURITY
description: Restricts unauthorized access to the Stores and unapproved modifications to official software.

title: SUBMISSIONS TO THE STORES
description: Regulates user-submitted content, including rights granted and obligations for posted materials.

title: THIRD-PARTY MATERIALS
description: Notes that some content is provided by external sources and disclaims Apple’s responsibility.

title: OBJECTIONABLE MATERIAL
description: Warns that some content may be offensive or indecent and disclaims liability for such content.

title: INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
description: Covers ownership and protection of proprietary content and trademarks in the Stores.

title: TERMINATION
description: Specifies grounds and effects of ending the agreement or restricting access to the Stores.

title: DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES; LIABILITY LIMITATIONS
description: Limits Apple’s liability for issues arising from the Stores and clarifies warranty disclaimers.

title: CHANGES
description: Allows Apple to modify these terms and states how users will be notified and may accept them.

title: MISCELLANEOUS
description: Provides additional clauses such as governing law, notices, and enforcement measures.

title: FURTHER MAC APP STORE AND APP STORE TERMS AND CONDITIONS
description: Extends the existing terms for specific scenarios related to Apple’s digital stores.

title: LICENSE OF MAC APP STORE AND APP STORE PRODUCTS
description: Establishes licensing terms for software offered through the Mac App Store and App Store.

title: IN-APP PURCHASES
description: Describes the option to acquire additional content or services within apps for a charge.

title: IN-APP SUBSCRIPTIONS
description: Outlines recurring billing features for content subscriptions and how to manage them.

title: POPULAR NEAR ME
description: Explains the location-based feature that recommends apps based on user proximity and usage data.

title: MAC APP STORE PRODUCT USAGE RULES
description: Lists conditions for downloading and using Mac apps on eligible Apple hardware.

title: APP STORE PRODUCT USAGE RULES
description: Sets out guidelines for using iOS apps, including device limits and account association.

title: MAC APP STORE AND APP STORE PRODUCT MAINTENANCE AND SUPPORT
description: Distinguishes maintenance responsibilities between Apple and third-party publishers.

title: LICENSED APPLICATION END USER LICENCE AGREEMENT
description: Defines the terms under which individual applications are licensed rather than sold to the user.

title: f  Limitation of Liability
description: Defines the scope and limits of the Licensor's liability, including disclaimers of certain types of damages and any exceptions under the agreement.

title: FURTHER IBOOKS STORE TERMS AND CONDITIONS
description: Provides additional terms and conditions specific to the iBooks Store, detailing obligations and rights for users in relation to iBooks Store content.

title: LICENSE OF IBOOKS STORE PRODUCTS
description: Governs the licensing terms for iBooks Store Products, including usage rights, limitations, and responsibilities between the user and the Publisher.

title: IBOOKS STORE PRODUCT USAGE RULES
description: Specifies how iBooks Store Products may be used, including permitted devices, storage limitations, and personal use restrictions.
